title: Planes, Pilots, and Paws
description:
With his restaurant business slowed by the pandemic, Eduard Seitan turned his energy toward another passion — taking flight for our furry friends in need.

Find out more about Pilots N Paws on their website

Follow Pilots N Paws on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
